terrain.description: Plains of wild flowers and grasses in various hues of greens, blues, and whites; long and loose so that with a strong wind the fields are indistinguishable from the ocean.

monument.name: The Black Rock
monument.description: A naval ship that's been beeched 3 miles inland.

secret.name: The Calahan Flower
secret.description: Shorter than the other flowers of the field, this is literally a needle in a haystack.

terrain.description: The path only shows you 20 feet in front of you and 20 feet behind you.

monument.name: The Swan Station
monument.description: Once a font of magical energy, after The Incident this station has been repurposed to dispersing the latent energies building up beneath.

secret.name: Vincent
secret.description: A dog who's made their home on the island.  He can answer one question before reverting to barking.

terrain.description: Jagged, aggressive, and forboeding, the Thunder Mountains are a presense no one can ignore.

monument.name: Stone Giant Village
monument.description: If you're friendly with the Stone Giants, this could be a place of Sanctuary.  Problem is, who's ever made friends with a Stone Giant?

secret.name: Triode of Endurance
secret.description: A gem that resists all attempts to harvest it.

monument.name: Yarland's Lair
monument.description: It would be a secret if it weren't for the Adult Green Dragon that lives here.

rumor.name: The Orchird
rumor.description: A brightspot among the muck.  Entrance to a MegaDungeon

secret.name: Mammoth's Rest
secret.description: A fossilized mammoth, stuck in the tar.
